ZSH Git Alias Index

Git alias shortcuts in ZSH.

gst

gst = git status

gd

gd = git diff

gdc

gdc = git diff –cached

gl

gl = git pull

gup

gup = git pull –rebase

gp

gp = git push

gd

gd = git diff

gc

gc = git commit -v

gc!

gc! = git commit -v –amend

gca

gca = git commit -v -a

gca!

gca! = git commit -v -a –amend

gcmsg

gcmsg = git commit -m

gco

gco = git checkout

gr

gr = git remote

grbi

grbi = git rebase -i

gb

gb = git branch

gba

gba = git branch -a

gcount

gcount = git shortlog -sn

gcp

gcp = git cherry-pick

glg

glg = git log –stat –max-count=10

glgg

glgg = git log –graph –max-count=10

glo

glo = git log –oneline –decorate –color

gss

gss = git status -s

ga

ga = git add

gm

gm = git merge

grhh

grhh = git reset HEAD –hard

gmt

gmt = git mergetool –no-prompt

gg

gg = git gui citool

gk

gk = gitk –all –branches
